attributes.action: Make testing for Group B Strep in pregnancy routine for ALL women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This test only involves a simple swab but is not done by some health trusts. If undetected it can cause problems during childbirth and death in newborns.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make testing for Group B Strep in pregnancy routine for ALL women."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17458


Prime Minister's Office
